description: Business rules, pricing logic, and permission systems

input.natural_language: Calculate discount based on purchase quantity

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:if condition="{quantity} >= 100">
  Discount: 30%
<q:elseif condition="{quantity} >= 50"/>
  Discount: 20%
<q:elseif condition="{quantity} >= 10"/>
  Discount: 10%
<q:else/>
  No discount
</q:if>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Tiered discount system based on quantity

input.natural_language: Calculate shipping based on total and location

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:if condition="{orderTotal} >= 100">
  Free shipping!
<q:else/>
  <q:if condition="{country} == 'USA'">
    Shipping: $5.99
  <q:elseif condition="{country} == 'Canada'"/>
    Shipping: $8.99
  <q:else/>
    Shipping: $15.99
  </q:if>
</q:if>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Free shipping over $100, otherwise country-based rates

input.natural_language: Show benefits based on membership tier

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:if condition="{membershipLevel} == 'platinum'">
  Free shipping
  Priority support
  Exclusive access
  25% off all items
<q:elseif condition="{membershipLevel} == 'gold'"/>
  Free shipping
  Priority support
  15% off all items
<q:elseif condition="{membershipLevel} == 'silver'"/>
  Free shipping on orders $50+
  10% off all items
<q:else/>
  Standard benefits
</q:if>

input.natural_language: Control access to features based on user role

expected_output.runtime_behavior: Role-based access control for UI components

input.natural_language: Show stock status and purchase options

expected_output.quantum_code: Out of Stock Only {stockCount} left! In Stock

input.natural_language: Allow purchase only if within credit limit

expected_output.quantum_code:
Available credit: {availableCredit}

Insufficient credit
